metadata.title: CVE-2021-30535 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Double free in ICU in Google Chrome prior to 91.0.4472.77 allowed a remoteattacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
icu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
